title: 修改盔甲架选择器名称……
author: MR.squid
txt_content:
就这样一个悬浮文字的指令：
/entitydata @e[type=armor_stand] {Invisible:1,Invulnerable:1,CustomName:"文字",CustomNameVisible:1}复制代码我现在的问题是是把@e[type=armor_stand]这一串要填一个名称，就是指定一个盔甲架……

help me~

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/entitydata @e[type=armor_stand,r=5] {Invisible:1,Invulnerable:1,CustomName:"文字",CustomNameVisible:1}

选择 5 格内的盔甲架
